name: Wedbuddy
overview:
Wedbuddy is a social, wedding, tech-startup with key features that our competitors (The Knot) don’t have.

We’ve got a clean site with no ads and great social integration and fun features like Task Management, where you can assign out wedding tasks to some of your key and VIP guests without everyone knowing - making your wedding and diy planning a lot easier!

We’ve got everything from resources, registries and ease of use!

Let me know if you have any questions! Looking forward to hearing from you.

Cheers, Renée

Renée Wedbuddy Marketing Director, Wedbuddy marketing@wed-buddy.com www.wedbuddy.com https://twitter.com/Wedbuddy 415-971-1491
